name: img-placeholder
description: Insert an img tag from placehold.it image into your code.
readme: # img-placeholder Atom Package A simple [placehold.it](http://placehold.it/) image plug-in for Atom. It allows you to quickly insert an `` tag into a project. After installing the package, simply hit the key command: `ctrl-cmd-p` --- ### Feature Improvements + Add Ratio, Size and Text Options
